mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_role ( id, role_id, role_name, delete_flag, reversion, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{roleId}, #{roleName}, #{deleteFlag}, #{reversion}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime} )
